segments.text: Come and meet our employees , Mr . Richards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Nicola Grey , and this is Claire Taylor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do ? Those women are very hard-working . What are their jobs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They ’ re keyboard operators . This is Michael Baker , and this is Jeremy Short .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do ? They aren ’ t very busy ! What are their jobs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They ’ re sales reps . They are very lazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Jim . He is our office assistant .
segments.speaker: S1
